thread.title: BRIEF-Lee Enterprises Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.19

title: BRIEF-Lee Enterprises Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.19
text:
35 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Lee Enterprises Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.19 Reuters Staff 
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Lee Enterprises Inc: * LEE ENTERPRISES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.63 * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19 * Q1 REVENUE FELL 6.6 PERCENT TO $143.8 MILLION 
* EXPECT CASH COSTS EXCLUDING WORKFORCE ADJUSTMENTS AND OTHER TO BE DOWN 6.0-6.5% IN FISCAL YEAR 2018, ON A SAME PROPERTY BASIS 
* ‍EXPECT CARRYOVER IMPACT FROM BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION IN FY2017 AND Q1 OF 2018 TO POSITIVELY IMPACT CASH COSTS REMAINDER OF 2018​ 
* ‍EXPECT CASH COSTS EXCLUDING WORKFORCE ADJUSTMENTS AND OTHER TO BE DOWN 6.0-6.5% IN FISCAL YEAR 2018, ON A SAME PROPERTY BASIS​ 
* CONTINUES TO “AGGRESSIVELY” REDUCE DEBT 
* LEE ENTERPRISES-IMPACT FROM REVALUING DEFERRED TAX ASSETS, LIABILITIES RESULTED IN PROVISIONAL NET DECREASE IN INCOME TAX EXPENSE OF $24.9 MILLION IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
